text: @realDonaldTrump due respect Mr. Pres., every newspaper &/or TV reporters are all fake news to you except Fox & Your Friends, Fox News have been downplaying the Coronavirus as a hoax & lying about it, if they would have said the truth from day1 maybe this crises would have not been so distructive
